subtitleNullable: News collected in text form from an online news site
descriptionNullable:
A total of 2248 news texts containing news items close to each other were collected. Table 1 shows the news collected from each news category and the average word count of these news. Each news text consists of an average of 1586 words. While the longest news belonged to the Culture-Art category, the shortest news was in the Magazine category. The reason for this situation can be shown as the fact that magazine news mainly consists of photographs.

Table 1. Number of News by Categories
Categories Total Number of News Average Number of Words
Life 292 1018
World 249 1450
Economy 261 2127
Culture and Art 183 3140
Magazine 315 606
Automobile 303 2056
Sports 315 1409
Technology 330 1573
Grand Total/Average 2248 1586

To use this dataset, the following article should be cited.

- Aydemir, E., Işık, M., Tuncer, T. (2021). Classification of Turkish News Texts with Multinomial Naive Bayes Algorithm, Fırat University Journal of Engineering Science
